Sentencas: Hybrid systems consisting of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) on the top of a steam turbine (ST) are investigated.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle with a rankine cycle

Sentencas: The plants are fired by natural gas (NG).
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle with a rankine cycle

Sentencas: A desulfurization reactor removes the sulfur content in the fuel while a pre-reformer breaks down the heavier hydro-carbons.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle with a rankine cycle

Sentencas: The pre-treated fuel enters then into the anode side of the SOFC.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle with a rankine cycle

Sentencas: The remaining fuels after the SOFC stacks enter a burner for further burning.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle with a rankine cycle

Sentencas: The off-gases are then used to produce steam for a Rankine cycle in a heat recovery steam generator (HRSG).
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle with a rankine cycle
Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle with a rankine cycle

Sentencas: Cyclic efficiencies up to 67% are achieved which is considerably higher than the conventional combined cycles (CC).
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle with a rankine cycle

Sentencas: Both adiabatic steam reformer (ASR) and catalytic partial oxidation (CPO) fuel pre-reformer reactors are considered in this investigation.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle with a rankine cycle
